#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
   while(1)
   {
   int a,b,c,d;
   cin>>a;
   cin>>b;
   if(a>0 && b>0)
   {
     int count=0;
       while(a>0 && b>0)
       {
           c=a%10;
           d=b%10;
           if(c+d>9)
           {
               count++;
           }

          a=a/10;
          b=b/10;
       }

       if(count>1)
       {
           cout<<count<<" carry operations."<<endl;

       }
       else if(count==1)
       {
           cout<<count<<" carry operation."<<endl;

       }
       else
       cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;



   }


   else
   break;
   }

return 0;
}
